channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 高盛集团（Goldman）的数据显示，对冲基金正以七个月来最快的速度抛售科技股，可能转向波动较小的行业
item.description:
Hedge funds are selling tech stocks at the fastest pace in seven months, data from Goldman show, possibly shifting into less-volatile industries https://t.co/qtX3GVP3Se

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 波兰外长称欧盟应恢复俄罗斯入侵前对乌克兰食品进口的贸易限制
item.description:
Poland’s foreign minister says the EU should restore trade restriction on Ukrainian food imports that existed before Russia’s invasion https://t.co/oeZ5y43a87

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: @BloombergLive 很高兴能与 PJT Partners 的保罗-陶布曼 (Paul Taubman)、@NuveenInv 的赛拉-马利克 (Saira Malik)、@bdtmsdpartners 的迪娜-鲍威尔-麦考密克 (Dina Powell McCormick) 和 @Lazard 的雷-麦奎尔 (Ray McGuire) 合作制定今年的议程。完整名单：
item.description:
Meet the #BloombergInvest Advisory Board.@BloombergLive is pleased to work with PJT Partners' Paul Taubman, @NuveenInv's Saira Malik, @bdtmsdpartners' Dina Powell McCormick, and @Lazard's Ray McGuire to craft this year's agenda.

Full List: https://t.co/yAiMbIVQzu pic.twitter.com/aOITjBcybV

— Bloomberg Live (@BloombergLive) February 26, 2024

item.title: 国会将在 3 月 1 日和 3 月 8 日迎来预算截止日期。政府会再次关门吗？如果会，会发生什么？
item.description:
Congress faces budget deadlines on March 1 and March 8. Will there be another government shutdown? If so, what happens? https://t.co/vQJhlxyg5X

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 大流行病造成的封锁掏空了尚未完全恢复的商业区。现在，商业地产陷入困境，而且危机可能不会就此结束
item.description:
Pandemic lockdowns emptied out business districts that have yet to fully recover. Now commercial real estate is in trouble, and the crisis may not end there https://t.co/KJRUTOoZgv pic.twitter.com/xJ2RCJ8KEx

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 实录：豌豆荚商店 "的兴起改变了市场交易方式
item.description:
Transcript: The Rise of ‘Pod Shops’ Changed How Markets Trade https://t.co/7QXSBv1tvB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 比亚迪已与意大利政府取得联系，作为该国吸引菲亚特制造商 Stellantis 之外的第二家汽车制造商的努力的一部分。
item.description:
BYD has been contacted by the Italian government as part of the country’s efforts to attract a second car manufacturer beyond Fiat maker Stellantis https://t.co/6z9whcT7Nd

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: B. Riley 的一名客户曾为一家倒闭的对冲基金提供咨询服务，但被指控未向损失了数亿美元的基金投资者还款
item.description:
A B. Riley client who had advised a hedge fund that collapsed has been accused of missing a repayment to the fund's investors who lost hundreds of millions of dollars https://t.co/ZvUk2rYxQT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一份长达 19 页的调查问卷要求太阳能产品进口商提供详细的供应链信息，这可能预示着对中国强迫劳动产品禁令的执行将更加严厉。
item.description:
A 19-page questionnaire sent to solar importers seeks detailed supply-chain information that could presage tougher enforcement of a ban on products made with forced labor in China https://t.co/BezwBEz7Fy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 意大利总理乔治亚-梅洛尼（Giorgia Meloni）领导的政府批准了一项 63 亿欧元的一揽子计划，以支持意大利工业的技术和绿色转型
item.description:
Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni’s government approved a €6.3 billion package to support the tech and green transition of Italian industries https://t.co/MKEEe6tOlv

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 明天：数据如何在整个金融领域发挥关键作用？加入我们与 @InvescoUS 共同举办的 #TheFutureInvestor 活动。直播时间：北京时间下午 4:45！
item.description:
TOMORROW: How is data playing a pivotal role across the financial landscape? Join us for #TheFutureInvestor with @InvescoUS.

Live at 4:45PM CST! https://t.co/WifckR6eDd pic.twitter.com/yttbiCWr2b

— Bloomberg Live (@BloombergLive) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据德意志银行（Deutsche Bank）称，对冲基金对一种流行交易策略的兴趣似乎正在减退，该策略旨在从现货国债与期货之间的价格差距中获利。
item.description:
Hedge fund interest in a popular trading strategy that’s meant to profit from price gaps between cash Treasuries and futures appears to be fading, according to Deutsche Bank https://t.co/lU82eWbZgi

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 本周在巴西举行的二十国集团峰会上，全球财政负责人希望避免就乌克兰和加沙战争展开激烈辩论
item.description:
Global finance chiefs are looking to avoid fraught debates on the wars in Ukraine and Gaza when they gather at this week's G-20 summit in Brazil https://t.co/zbrONsdYyt

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 我们期待着重返多哈，参加 5 月 14 日至 16 日的卡塔尔经济论坛。请关注本空间的演讲者公告和更新！#منتدى_قطر_الاقتصادي #QatarEconomicForum在此注册您的兴趣：
item.description:
We’re looking forward to returning to Doha for the Qatar Economic Forum May 14th-16th. Watch this space for speaker announcements and updates! #منتدى_قطر_الاقتصادي #QatarEconomicForum

Register your interest here:https://t.co/MhgWlTM1JD pic.twitter.com/rLoN21utBx

— QatarEconForum (@QatarEconForum) February 26, 2024

item.title: 杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，只要美国不出现经济衰退，商业地产的问题就会被控制在 "小范围 "内。
item.description:
Jamie Dimon said problems in commercial real estate will be contained to "pockets" of the sector as long as the US avoids a recession https://t.co/mGlyZ77HL4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 英国亿万富翁乔-刘易斯（Joe Lewis）的一名飞行员在纽约承认犯有内幕交易罪，承认自己根据老板的提示进行了利润丰厚的交易
item.description:
A pilot for British billionaire Joe Lewis has pleaded guilty to insider trading in New York, admitting to making lucrative trades based on tips from his boss https://t.co/Z4u29aCazH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 在美联储今年大幅降息的希望逐渐破灭之际，投资者上周以有史以来最快的速度涌入中期国债 ETF
item.description:
Investors piled into an intermediate-term Treasury ETF at the fastest pace on record last week amid fading hopes that the Fed will cut interest rates deeply this year https://t.co/b7DbO0nX6P

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 自 2016 年以来，嘉信资本的对冲基金资产下降了 90%，降至约 10 亿美元，作为重组的一部分，嘉信资本正在关闭其伦敦办事处。
item.description:
Carlson Capital is shuttering its London office as part of a restructuring after the hedge fund’s assets dropped 90% to about $1 billion since 2016. https://t.co/4cMnv9BPCW

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 上周英国下议院因停火投票引发的混乱所造成的影响仍在持续。另外，对英国房屋建筑商的卡特尔调查会发现什么？与 @AllegraStratton 一起来了解详情。
item.description:
The repercussions of last week's chaos in the UK House of Commons over a ceasefire vote are still being felt. Plus, what will the cartel investigation into British housebuilders find? Get The Readout with @AllegraStratton https://t.co/U4zZrI4YWZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 壳牌支持的巴西公司 Raizen 据称酝酿出售绿色债券
item.description:
Shell-Backed Brazil Firm Raizen Is Said to Mull Green Bond Sale https://t.co/9z7INNuK7A

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 摩根士丹利财富管理公司首席信息官 Lisa Shalett 认为，现在是投资者摒弃 "美国独大 "观点的时候了。
item.description:
It’s time for investors to move away from the view that the US is the only game in town, according to Lisa Shalett, CIO at Morgan Stanley Wealth Management https://t.co/gAdDZCEro0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 一位加密货币律师挑战伊丽莎白-沃伦的参议员席位，马萨诸塞州共和党人说 "我不认识他"。
item.description:
A crypto lawyer challenges Elizabeth Warren’s Senate seat, and Massachusetts Republicans say, “I don’t know him.” https://t.co/intZjMivWT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 美国商务部长吉娜-雷蒙多（Gina Raimondo）表示，先进半导体公司已经为美国在建项目申请了两倍以上的可用联邦资金。
item.description:
Advanced semiconductor companies have requested more than double the amount of available federal funds for projects under construction in the US, Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo said. https://t.co/wzh8Sk5Dr4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 伦敦对冲基金 "清洁能源转型"（Clean Energy Transition）的一位前合伙人正在创办一家新公司，试图从绿色能源转型中挑选赢家和输家。
item.description:
A former partner at London-based hedge fund Clean Energy Transition is starting a new firm that tries to pick winners and losers from the green energy transition https://t.co/P7FGXXUXeL

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 经济学家表示，新西兰央行本周可能将继续按兵不动，但由于通胀难以控制，央行仍有可能加息
item.description:
New Zealand’s central bank will likely keep interest rates on hold this week but retain the threat of a hike as inflation proves difficult to tame, economists say https://t.co/ESbXMkHxko

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 欧洲领导人将讨论从地区外国家购买弹药以支持乌克兰的提议
item.description:
European leaders will discuss a proposal to buy ammunition from countries outside the region to support Ukraine https://t.co/NGW9FDzSTC

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 瑞士制药巨头罗氏公司正在考虑出售肺病药物埃斯布里埃塔，该药物在廉价仿制药的竞争下销量急剧下滑
item.description:
Swiss pharmaceuticals giant Roche is considering selling lung disease drug Esbrieta that’s seen sales plummet amid competition from cheaper generics https://t.co/NtbnW5thgZ

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 欧洲央行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德表示，通胀将继续放缓，但她需要看到更多的证据表明物价增长正在回归 2% 的目标
item.description:
ECB President Christine Lagarde says inflation will continue to slow but she needs to see more evidence that price growth is returning to the 2% goal https://t.co/9zMOkMIoM0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 比特币升至两年多来的最高点，超过 53 000 美元。
item.description:
Bitcoin rose to the highest in more than two years, climbing above $53,000. https://t.co/cNDzQT2eiT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024

item.title: 据一项民意调查显示，自唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在 2016 年竞选总统期间推广这一理念以来，首次有大多数美国人支持在美墨边境修建隔离墙。
item.description:
A majority of Americans support building a wall along the US-Mexico border for the first time since Donald Trump popularized the idea during his 2016 presidential bid, according to a poll https://t.co/kxIbzUJch2

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 26, 2024
